title: Painting
details: The great artists of the past were aware that human life is full of chaos and suffering. But they had a remedy for this. And the name of that remedy was ‘beauty’.

title: Fashion Design
details: While fashion design subjects can seem like a narrow field, composed of only designing and producing apparel-fashion design degrees encompass everything related to fashion industry.

title: Interior Design
details: The design of everything from hospital rooms to malls have been designed with a specific purpose or goal in mind. The rooms and spaces you encounter on a daily basis are studied in the subject of interior design.

title: Music History
details: Music history or historic musicology is one of the most important components of musicology, a discipline that documents the development of musical art and its culture in the course of time.
